0: assert find_children("abcABC") == "ABcaBcAc", f"Expected 'abcABC' to return 'ABcaBcAc', but got {find_children('abcABC')}"
assert find_children("aAbaBb") == "AaaBbb", f"Expected 'aAbaBb' to return 'AaaBbb', but got {find_children('aAbaBb')}"
assert find_children("AaaBbbCccDdd") == "AaaBbbCccDdd", f"Expected 'AaaBbbCccDdd' to return 'AaaBbbCccDdd', but got {find_children('AaaBbbCccDdd')}"
